events.name: Hack Omaha
events.about:
Hack Omaha is a daylong sprint on October 13 where coders, designers and data junkies turn government information into something useful, revealing and beautiful.

The cost is low. The payoff huge. Come play with our data and make something incredible.

It will be held at the Presidents residence at Metropolitan Community College. You might want to refer to the map to track down the building.
